H0.text: how many games does a football team have to win to be bowl eligible. 3

H1.text: how many games does a football team have to win to be bowl eligible. 6

H2.text: how many games does a football team have to win to be bowl eligible. 7

H3.text: how many games does a football team have to win to be bowl eligible. 5

A4.text: Teams with a minimum non-losing, or .500, record can qualify for bowl games if their conference has a contract with a bowl game.

A5.text: In thirteen-game seasons (used because of conference championship games, or allowable for Hawai ªi and any of its home opponents in a given season), a team must win seven games.

A6.text: At the Division I FBS level, teams must earn the right to be bowl eligible by winning at least 6 games during the season.
